sn22.36:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.36:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.36:1.7: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.36:2.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.36:2.9: Rūpañce, bhante, nānuseti na taṃ anumīyati;
sn22.36:2.10: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.36:2.15: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.36:2.16: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.36:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
sn22.36:3.10: Rūpañce, bhikkhu, nānuseti na taṃ anumīyati;
sn22.36:3.11: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.36:3.16: yaṃ nānumīyati na tena saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
sn22.36:3.17: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.36:3.18: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosīti.
